thread.title: Ericka Thomas
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Ericka Thomas

author: Ericka Thomas
title: Ericka Thomas
text: I had such a speedy and professional service a couple months back when getting my awesome sectional that I chose a set of 4 brand new dining chairs that wowed my party goers 24 hours after purchase! Gardner white came through for me. No one but Gardner White could promise me next day delivery. Thanks to them my party was a hit!
